children.code:
{
	"$schema": "https://schemas.wp.org/trunk/block.json",
	"apiVersion": 3,
	"name": "create-block/{{.KebabCaseComponentName}}",
	"version": "0.1.0",
	"title": "{{.PascalCaseComponentName}}",
	"category": "theme",
	"icon": "media-interactive",
	"description": "An interactive block with the Interactivity API.",
	"example": {},
	"supports": {
		"interactivity": true
	},
	"textdomain": "{{.KebabCaseComponentName}}",
	"editorScript": "file:./index.js",
	"editorStyle": "file:./index.css",
	"style": "file:./style-index.css",
	"render": "file:./render.php",
	"viewScriptModule": "file:./view.js"
}
children.name: block.json
edit.js
editor.scss
index.js

children.code:
# {{.PascalCaseComponentName}} Block

This block was generated using a CLI and demonstrates a structure for an interactive block using the WordPress Interactivity API.
